actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to establish a John W. McCormack senior intern program.

summary.text: Creates the John W. McCormack Senior Intern program in the House of Representatives. Authorizes each Member, Delegate, or Commissioner of the House to hire two additional employees under such program. States that each intern may serve not more than two weeks. Requires that all such interns be 60 years of age or older and be residents of the district which the employing Member, Commissioner, or Delegate represents. Makes available to each Member, Resident Commissioner, or Delegate an annual payment of $500 for payment of compensation to such interns, in addition to other allowances available to such Member, Resident Commissioner, or Delegate.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a John W. McCormack senior intern program.
